data.title: Preschool Program – St. Stanislaus Kostka School – Adams, MA – PreK to 8 Catholic Education
data.text:
The school year calendar follows the Hoosac Valley Regional School District calendar with the same holidays and vacations. Preschool classes are held from right after Labor Day through the first Friday in June.

Saint Stanislaus Kostka School is currently accepting registrations for Preschool students. Please click on our Registration link to access further information and necessary forms.
